LDAP_URL.description: LDAP Server's URL and port, used for user authentication

BASE_DN_LIST.description: Colon separated list of Base DNs

SEARCH_FILTER.description: LDAP filter used to find the user

MUNIN_URL.description: JIRA's URL, used to allow access to MUNIN through REST API or the UI.

MIMER_URL.description: MIMER's URL, used to allow access to MIMER through REST API or the UI.

MUNIN_URL_SANDBOX.description: JIRA's URL, used to allow access to MUNIN Sandbox through REST API or the UI.

MIMER_URL_SANDBOX.description: JIRA's URL, used to allow access to MIMER Sandbox Issues through REST API or the UI.
